name: Project 941
description:
Do you have a few minutes and a friend? Play Project 941, a 2 players local multiplayer competitive game.

Collect a diamond of each color to win and use force waves to push your opponent out of your way or into the abyss!

And don't forget to watch out for those yellow tiles... they will vanish when you least expect it!

A game by Luis Miguel Herrera.

Music by Eric Skiff.
